title: Data-driven Predictive Modeling and Impact Analysis of Global Temperature Rise
venue: Proc. SPIE 13219, Fourth International Conference on Applied Mathematics, Modeling, and Intelligent Computing (CAMMIC 2024)
excerpt: This paper presents a data-driven predictive modeling approach to analyze the impacts of global temperature rise.
citation: First Author. (2024). “Data-driven Predictive Modeling and Impact Analysis of Global Temperature Rise.” Proc. SPIE 13219. 132193L. https://doi.org/10.1117/12.3036557

title: A Silicon Element Quality Inspection System Based on YOLOv8
venue: Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Automation Engineering
excerpt: This paper introduces a YOLOv8-based system for quality inspection of silicon elements.
citation: First Author. (2024). “A Silicon Element Quality Inspection System Based on YOLOv8.” Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Automation Engineering. Pages 29 – 35. https://doi.org/10.1145/3696687.3696693

title: Harmony in the Deep: Lamprey gender ratio model based on the Lotka-Volterra model
venue: In Proceedings of the International Conference on Modeling, Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning (CMNM '24)
excerpt: This paper explores a model based on the Lotka-Volterra equations to analyze the gender ratio of lampreys.
citation: First Author. (2024). “Harmony in the Deep: Lamprey gender ratio model based on the Lotka-Volterra model.” In Proceedings of the International Conference on Modeling, Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning (CMNM '24). https://doi.org/10.1145/3677779.3677818

title: Credit Scoring Card Combination Optimization Model Based on QUBO
venue: Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Automation Engineering
excerpt: This paper discusses an optimization model for credit scoring card combinations using QUBO.
citation: First Author. (2024). “Credit Scoring Card Combination Optimization Model Based on QUBO.” Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition and Automation Engineering. Pages 159 – 165. https://doi.org/10.1145/3696687.3696715

title: Modeling simulation of tower-type photovoltaic power plant -Optimization design of heliostat field based on particle swarm algorithm
excerpt: This paper presents a modeling simulation for optimizing the heliostat field design of a tower-type photovoltaic power plant.
citation: First Author. (2024). “Modeling simulation of tower-type photovoltaic power plant -Optimization design of heliostat field based on particle swarm algorithm.” Submit to SUSTAINABLE COMPUTING-INFORMATICS & SYSTEMS.
